entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Rocky Mountain House 2:00 PM MDT Saturday 25 March 2023

Wind: NNW 13 km/h

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High plus 5.

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 12:11 PM MDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
